class RunParams[source]

RunParams(model='gpt2', data_dir='data/', data_files={'train': ['data/wiki.train.raw'], 'valid': ['data/wiki.valid.raw'], 'test': ['data/wiki.test.raw']}, max_epochs=1000, debug=True, batch_size=8, data_set_percentage=1, seq_length=32, statement_length=16, momentum=0.9, lr=0.01, repo='wikitext-103-raw-v1', num_workers=16, kb_statements_file=None, run_name='test', project_name='kirby')
